WorkItem.Description: Still bugged with negative values....even on Ulduar gear being ranked below vendor blues...Theres a serious issue with the way haste is modeled in RAWR for elemental shamans, and clicks round up/down makes no difference.  More haste is always better at certain plateaus, namely the 5th and 6th lightning bolts.  The module should never return neg values.

Comments.Message: this would explain why my t8.5 chest that completes my 4 set bonus is showing as negative dps >.<  would really like to see this resolved.  Love the program otherwise.
Generally, if gear with haste is negative in value in any module, you're usually running out of mana.

Always the same problem in 2.2.7 version.
This is not a running out of mana error, but a cycle calculation error in Rawr 2.2.6 and 2.2.7.
4 Lighting Bolt become 3 Lighting Bolt with more haste, instead of 5 Lighting Bolt.
We really could use a dedicated Elemental developer. These issues are still showing up in newer versions because there's nobody to fix them currently. WTB Elemental dev.

I assume you know its still a problem in the new 2.2.8. 
@Antivyris - It might be that RAWR thinks im running out of mana - but trust me I don't. Any chance of implementing some "unlimited mana" check-box to "fix" this?

If I check the "Relative Stat Values", haste isn't enven on that list, what gives?

...I _LOVE_ RAWR as a mage and have been useing it for a long time, but as this elemental module is working atm, its not really to any help :/
I really hope you guys find a dedicated elemental dev for this.

Each model needs its own developer there is simply far too much to do for any one person to work on lots of models and to be frank most ppl know their own class/spec and don't know the theory well enough for all the others. If no-one comes forward to update the Elemental model it WILL NOT CHANGE. The ball is in the users court someone who knows Elemental Shaman theorycrafting needs to volunteer. Once they do we can give them lots of help and support to understand how to program Rawr, but we need someone willing to fix things, otherwise the model will be stuck in its current state.
changeset 31991 broke this.  see the change to elemental spells.cs  just compare it to the previous revision.  the previous calculation was correct.
A patch fixing this got applied.
